story_arceus_07_03000/2401_1001_0200_10:
That’s Giovanni from Team Rocket...and his
executives, too!
story_arceus_07_03000/2401_1001_0300_10:
So you brave little children were the ones
getting in our way?
story_arceus_07_03000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Were you so scared to battle alone that you
called for backup?
story_arceus_07_03000/2401_1001_0500_10: Heh, jealous? MY protégés are dependable.
story_arceus_07_03000/2401_1001_0600_10:
The three of us could just take you down
right here.
story_arceus_07_03000/2401_1001_0700_10:
But before we do, I have some questions for
you, Giovanni.
story_arceus_07_03000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Why have you been going around attacking
random sync pairs?
story_arceus_07_03000/2401_1001_0900_10: It’s almost like your goal is just...to fight.
story_arceus_07_03000/2401_1001_1000_10: It’s nothing that should be of any concern.
story_arceus_07_03000/2401_1001_1100_10:
I’m simply teaching my subordinates how to
use a new tool we’ve obtained.
story_arceus_07_03000/2401_1001_1200_10:
We have sync stones ultimate... I presume
you do as well, do you not?
story_arceus_07_03000/2401_1001_1400_10:
But how? They haven’t been giving them out
to troublemakers like you!
story_arceus_07_03000/2401_1001_1500_10: Don’t tell me you stole them!
story_arceus_07_03000/2401_1001_1600_10:
I haven’t stolen a thing. Luckily, someone
was willing to part with theirs.
story_arceus_07_03000/2401_1001_1700_10:
However, we are yet unable to draw out
more power from them than from regular
sync stones.
story_arceus_07_03000/2401_1001_1800_10:
One day, I shall obtain my own arc suit and
the power that comes with it. And I’ll use
it to take over Pasio once and for all!
story_arceus_07_03000/2401_1001_1900_10:
Blue...I’m sure you understand by now
there’s no such thing as good or evil when
it comes to the power of bonds.
story_arceus_07_03000/2401_1001_2100_10:
I can’t let this slide. You’re hurting people
and Pokémon.
story_arceus_07_03000/2401_1001_2200_10:
Arc suits aren’t meant to show off how
strong we are.
story_arceus_07_03000/2401_1001_2300_10:
They’re proof you and your Pokémon have a
genuine bond!
story_arceus_07_03000/2401_1001_2500_10:
If you treat Pokémon like tools, there’s no
way you’ll get an arc suit!
story_arceus_07_03000/2401_1001_2700_10:
I wouldn’t underestimate Team Rocket if I
were you.
story_arceus_07_03000/2401_1001_2800_10:
Unless you’d like us to test our sync stones
ultimate on you next?
story_arceus_07_03000/2401_1001_2900_10: Hang on a sec, Elaine. Chase.
story_arceus_07_03000/2401_1001_3000_10:
We could battle here and now, but that
wouldn’t solve anything.
story_arceus_07_03000/2401_1001_3200_10: I challenge you to a battle, Giovanni.
story_arceus_07_03000/2401_1001_3300_10:
But let’s have it on the best stage—at the
Arceus Cup!
story_arceus_07_03000/2401_1001_3500_10:
Let’s have a full-on battle. One-on-one, six
Pokémon each.
story_arceus_07_03000/2401_1001_3600_10:
Whoever KO’s all of the other’s Pokémon
wins.
story_arceus_07_03000/2401_1001_3700_10:
If your goal’s to draw out the power of sync
stones ultimate, it should be a pretty sweet
deal for you, too.
story_arceus_07_03000/2401_1001_3800_10:
One condition, though. Until the end of the
match, you stop attacking random sync pairs.
story_arceus_07_03000/2401_1001_3900_10:
Excuse you. There’s no way Master Giovanni
would fall for such an obvious trap.
story_arceus_07_03000/2401_1001_4000_10:
I suppose that’s your way of luring us
into the arena, where it’s easier to
apprehend us.
story_arceus_07_03000/2401_1001_4100_10:
My subordinates are right...though your offer
IS compelling.
story_arceus_07_03000/2401_1001_4200_10:
I could also talk to Lear and that guy from
the International Police and get them to stay
out of it, if that’d help.
story_arceus_07_03000/2401_1001_4500_10: Let’s battle at the Arceus Cup!
story_arceus_07_03000/2401_1001_4700_10:
I’ve always wanted to settle the score
between us!
story_arceus_07_03000/2401_1001_4800_10:
You didn’t leave anything for me when I
took over, so it was a pain in the neck to
get the Gym up and running, ya know.
story_arceus_07_03000/2401_1001_5000_10: Oh. So that’s what happened in your world.
story_arceus_07_03000/2401_1001_5100_10:
Well. Preposterous as it sounds, a part of me
does feel a sense of nostalgia.
story_arceus_07_03000/2401_1001_5400_10:
There’s one major thing that sets the two of
us apart.
story_arceus_07_03000/2401_1001_5500_10:
I’ll prove it to you at the Arceus Cup, so be
ready! You’re gonna get whopped!
